thread.title: Clean hotel with good location
thread.title_full: Clean hotel with good location - Review of Prime Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: PÃ¤r W
title: Clean hotel with good location
text: I visited this hotel with my family with two small children. We had a family suite. The rooms are very nice and clean, nothing to complain about. The front desk service was good and all staff was very helpful and service minded. The breakfast was good, although a bit pricy. The location of the hotel is very good, most things within walking distance.
